snippet: Jason Leffler, a two-time winner in Nascar’s Nationwide Series, died after an accident on Wednesday night at a dirt car event at Bridgeport Speedway in New Jersey.
abstract: Nascar driver Jason Leffler dies after accident at dirt car event at Bridgeport Speedway in New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: Jason Leffler, a two-time winner in Nascar’s Nationwide Series, died after an accident on Wednesday night at a dirt car event at Bridgeport Speedway in New Jersey.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
